Text.Page:
! I would speak with you a moment.

I've need of someone to perform a task. My own duties keep me tied to my principal or I'd attend to this myself. You, on the other hand, are free to act.

Hunt down and kill the {@LinkCreature:26#1003#ebon weavers}. Whatever their goal, hindering it benefits us all.

I'm grateful for your swift and efficient assistance. That's just the kind of aid I needed.

We'll part ways here, but perhaps I can repay this favor in the future.
